Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 54th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1970...
Injured on 4/13/1972 with a Bruised Finger, out for 2 days...
Injured on 5/26/1973 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/12/1975 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Traded from Philadelphia to Los Angeles on 1/31/1976 (Going to LA: P D. Spillner. Going to PHI: 3B M. Kakefu, RF J. Youngblood)...
Earned first career win on 4/1/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1977, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1980, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/26/1982 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 9/26/1982 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1983, winning 2 games with a 4.40 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1983, going 6-1, 2.48...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/28/1984 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 8/19/1984 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles to New York (N) on 1/31/1985 (Going to LA: P D. Ward. Going to NYM: P D. Spillner)...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1985...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1987...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (A) on 5/12/1989 (Going to NYM: P A. Ashby. Going to CHW: P C. Bosio, P D. Spillner)...
